sentence: This hotel is really excellent in terms of location room comfort and facilities
Wonderful stay staff very friendly enjoyed coffee and cookies in the lobby upon check in
Love the new TVs in the lobby

We picked the Hilton garden hotel through Thomas cook as part of our package because the hotel looked great and very good location and we knew the group of Hilton in UK are generally good we was not disappointed on arrival a warm welcome and lovely room with 2 large beds en suite with all the usual free toiletries good quality nutrogena ones replaced daily with bath and over bath power shower with large and small towels replaced daily
Front lobby has drinks
The room I had was clean and all of the amenities was as described
Clean nice lobby
Staff was very friendly look of facility was very good cleanliness of room was excellent
Great reception team
The rooms beds amenities etc are fantastic
Update the lamps and fix the exercise equipment and it would be excellent
They woke us each morning before 7AM moving carts and talking very loudly in the hallway
The elevator dropped a flight and I reported it to the front desk three times
The elevators has passed the inspection date with 10 month
But there is a nice workout indoor facility and an outdoor pool for warmer weather
Free coffee in room and in lobby good flavor and strong enoughcould not get wifi to work
it is fine my room had small details regarding maintenance and we found an elevator with our floor button damaged so we had to go up to our room only in one of the 2 elevators available

At 9 am starts the slamming of the entry doors by the housekeepers and it continues to well past 1 pm this could be fixed by adjusting the setting on the door closing device but instead they all slam so hard you not only hear it down the hall but can feel the pressure difference in your room when a door slams
A construction worker rudely pushed past my boyfriend while we were waiting for the elevator
The hotel was under construction at the time so only our room and ballroom were open
